acceleration_x.docs:
Use the X-Axis of the Accelerometer. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [BMI160 Accelerometer/Gyroscope Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bmi160.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**, int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x68`, may also be `0x69`.

*See also: [BMI160 Accelerometer/Gyroscope Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bmi160.html#configuration-variables)*

**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.
